name: Fedora Museum
description:
The mic audio quality is bad on the trailer, please use captions for this. I AM SORRY ABOUT THIS

Overview

Fedora Museum is an underwhelming relaxing, low effort minimalistic walking simulator where you walk around and explore the terrific fedora museum, filled with all of its amazing fedoras.

Experience the calming atmosphere of a museum (without the noise of tourists and kids screaming and crying). It is certain to leave you with a boring & confusing great & relaxing experience.

Fedora Museum is more than just a game, it is T.R.A.S.H (don'T woRry About it, itS all [Hyperlink blocked]).

Don't believe me? See what one of our customer says about this

Controls

WASD to Move, Left click to pick/drop things, Space Bar to jump

Extra Submission Info (For DATT 3300 prof and ta):

Link to the game doc: https://docs.google.com/document/d/15ldR7zeWqf--xbCoS1AAWJkXhdEgxQN5nXCr1VtQ9ec/...

Name: Joseph Yong

Which lab I am from: Lab #1

Like what I am doing or want to support for future projects?

Feel free to follow my social media stuff under my profile and share this game to your friends or what not.

The game is 100% free to play, you don't have to donate money. Donations are completely optional.

If you wish to donate, you can donate here on itch.io or by twitch donations using my streamlabs donation link on my streams
